subject: More on experimental programming
msgSnippet: I ve written another story about the benefits of experimental programming: http://cafe.elharo.com/testing/negative-experimental-programming/ My definition of
messageBody:
I've written another story about the benefits of experimental programming:

http://cafe.elharo.com/testing/negative-experimental-programming/

My definition of experimental programming is hacking to make the tests
pass without necessarily understanding why they do. This variation is
perhaps less controversial. It describes rejecting a patch without
necessarily understanding why the patch fails.

--
